trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There was one other sighting in Tucson on or around August 29th 2011
Summary: Saw a star it went dim and faded out, called my gf, we both saw it reappear and get bright then fade back out, but farthur away from first sighting, In a straight line path, 0 clouds all stars were visible.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home, appx 8:00 pm arizona time, I am a home renter and we have to smoke outside, I got up to go smoke in the backyard, I always look to the stars to see if its clear or cloudy, I happened to catch a star to my east direction brighter than normal, didnt think much of it, but it looked like a power surge, it got brighter then faded out to black, I called my girlfriend out who has very poor eyesight to say I just saw a wierd thing, then it reappeared and went from dim to very bright again, she actually saw it too and also told me she had seen something like that a week earlier but thought it was just her eye, I told her to grab my phone so I could video it, but it did not reappear, it was moving in a straight line somewhat north westerly, I am not crazy and I hope others saw it as well. other than fadeing in and out I didnt witness anything that made it unusual except it was brighter than any other star and it went black, we watched for several minutes more in the trajectory I would have imagined it would have traveled but nothing further.We both felt as if we had seen our first UFO together I am 41 years old and must say I was excited, and the fact that it was bright enough for her to see was great, she has very poor vision I am glad we both got to share this. I watched the trajectory of what I thought it would go but nothing. I am hoping others saw it as well and together we can all share in what we saw.
